Title: Tayu Tayu
Description: [Tayu Tayu, ' is an anime adaptation of the adult manga of the same name by Yamatogawa.', ' ', ' ', ' ', " Since his parents moved abroad for business, Reiji was forced to live at his old place in the country side.
